Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

OrderAdjustmentState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - STATE_UNABLE_ADJUST: Unable adjust state
 - STATE_REQUIRE_ADJUST: Require adjust state
 - STATE_NO_ADJUST: No adjust state
 - STATE_ERROR: Error state
OrderAdjustmentState.title: The order adjustment state

ValidationMessageLevel.description:
The validation message level.

 - LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - LEVEL_WARNING: Warning message level
 - LEVEL_ERROR: Error message level

v1AutoInvestAllocationRule.description: Describes the allocation rule in an auto invest target.

clientTargetId.title: Investment target identifier of the child client portfolio target

v1AutoInvestTarget.description: Describes the cash balance target for automated investment.

cashTargetId.title: Investment target identifier of the master cash source target

cashBankAccount.title: Cash bank account for the cash balance source

effectiveTime.title: Target execution effective time in UTC timezone

portalId.title: The entity identifier for the web portal

v1CashBankAccount.description: Describes the cash bank account for the balance source.

portalId.title: The entity identifier for the portal associated with the cash portfolio

clientPortfolioIds.title: List of available client portfolio codes

v1ComplianceMessage.description: Compliance message describes the compliance violation result from the compliance check.

violationLevel.title: The level of the compliance violation

message.title: The message of the compliance violation

adjustment.title: The order adjustment for the compliance violation

pageToken.title: The starting point of a query result

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of auto invest targets to be returned per page of results.
The maximum allowed page size is 1000.  Default is 100 if empty or a number < 1 is specified.

nextPageToken.title: Indicates the next page to retrieve

v1InvestTargetAction.description:
The auto invest target action.

 - INVEST_TARGET_ACTION_UNSPECIFIED: unspecified action
 - INVEST_TARGET_ACTION_SAVE: save action
 - INVEST_TARGET_ACTION_DELETE: delete action
 - INVEST_TARGET_ACTION_PAUSE: pause action
 - INVEST_TARGET_ACTION_RESUME: resume action

v1InvestTargetState.description:
The auto invest target state.

 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: unspecified status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_NEW: new status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_ACTIVE: active status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_FUTURE_ACTIVE: future active
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_INACTIVE: inactive status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_FUTURE_INACTIVE: future inactive status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_PENDING_APPROVAL: pending approval status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_CANCELLED: cancelled status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_TERMINATED: terminated status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_FUTURE_TERMINATED: future terminated status
 - INVEST_TARGET_STATE_ERROR: error status

v1OrderAdjustment.description: Order adjustment describes the order adjustment for the compliance violation.

min.title: The minimum amount that can be used in the order

max.title: The maximum amount that can be used in the order

v1QueryAutoInvestTargetsRequest.title: Auto invest targets batch retrieval request

v1QueryAutoInvestTargetsResponse.title: Auto invest targets batch retrieval response

v1ScheduleOffset.description: Describes the target execution schedule offset.

source.title: Schedule offset source - auto invest cash target id

v1UpsertAutoInvestTargetsRequest.title: Upsert multiple auto invest targets request

portalId.title: The entity identifier for the web portal

targetAction.title: Action to upsert the auto invest targets

autoInvestTargets.title: List of auto invest targets to upsert

v1UpsertAutoInvestTargetsResponse.title: Upsert multiple auto invest targets response

v1Validation.description: Validation describes the result from the business and compliance validations.

v1ValidationMessage.description: Validation message describes the validation check message.

messageLevel.title: The level from the validation rule

message.title: The message from the validation rule

v1ValidationSource.description: Validation source describes the source of the validation result.

sourceKey.title: The unique identifier of the validation source
